name: Dark Spacken.net Admin Panel
description: A Dark Theme for the Admin Panel of Spacken.net
additional_info:
Thanks to Spacken.net for using my Dark Theme in some parts of the admin panel.

Update: 1.2
- Some color changes to fit the color language of spacken.net

Update: 1.1
- Added login page
- Fixed context menu
- Fixed drop down menu
- New hover color
- Some other bug fixes
